snippet.title: BalanCity / Release Trailer
snippet.description:
BalanCity on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/462680

BalanCity is a city building / balance physics game. It's a mixture between old school SimCity and Jenga. You must build the tallest towering city over a balancing platform while keeping your citizens happy. You can build residences, offices, power plants, train stations, airports, landmarks and more.




More info at: 

http://facebook.com/balanCityGame / http://balan.city
